Package de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanim_utilities

Provides utility classes for the Android property animation technique.

The two fundamental classes are

  • AnimatedGuiObjectCV which is the base class for GUI objects to be animated and

  • AnimationViewCV to hold, display, and animate these objects.

For details, please watch these three videos: Overview, Code, Demo

read the documentation of the two fundamental classes and have a look at the demo code in the companion package de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanimutil_demos.


This work is provided by Prof. Dr. Carsten Vogt, Technische Hochschule Köln, Fakultät für Informations-, Medien- und Elektrotechnik, Germany

under GPLv3, the GNU General Public License 3, http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html.

See Also:
AnimatedGuiObjectCV, AnimationViewCV, de.thkoeln.cvogt.android.propanimutil_demos
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnimatedGuiObjectCV.OnPropertyChangedListener
    Interface for classes to react on property changes on an object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV, e.g. to detect collisions with other objects.
    AnimationViewCV.CollisionHandler
    Interface for classes to handle collisions between animated objects.
    AnimationViewCV.OnTouchListener
    Interface for Listeners that can be registered with an AnimationViewCV object and that will be called when a touch event occurs on this object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimatedCounterCV
    Class for counters that count from a specified start value to a specified end value.
    AnimatedGuiObjectCV<T>
    Adapter class for animating objects of class Drawable or class View by applying the property animation techniques of Android.
    AnimatedGuiObjectCV.ObjectProperties
    Class to store and later to restore member values of an object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV - mainly those values that pertain to the presentation of the object on the display.
    AnimatedGuiObjectsGroupCV
    Class for groups of objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV that can be animated together.
    AnimationUtilsCV
    This class provides some utility classes and methods for animation programming with the classes AnimationViewCV and AnimatedGuiObjectCV
    AnimationUtilsCV.EndListener_Delete
    Listener to remove an object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV from the view of class AnimationViewCV where it is registered.
    AnimationUtilsCV.EndListener_DeleteIfNotVisible
    Listener to remove an object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV from the view of class AnimationViewCV where it is registered.
    AnimationUtilsCV.OnTouchListener_Relocation
    Listeners that relocate an object in accordance with the moving finger of the user.
    AnimationUtilsCV.PropertyChangedListener_Collision
    Listener to react upon collisions between objects.
    AnimationViewCV
    ViewGroup class to display animated objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV (i.e. animated Drawable and View objects) with.
    For more comments on how to proceed, see the documentation of the class AnimatedGuiObjectCV.

    N.B.: Views of this class can currently not be embedded in a layout together with other views.
    AnimationViewCV_TestForEmbedding
    ViewGroup class to display animated objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV (i.e. animated Drawable and View objects) with.
    For more comments on how to proceed, see the documentation of the class AnimatedGuiObjectCV.



    Author: Prof.
    AnimationViewCV.GestureListener
    Class for gesture listeners that can be registered with an AnimationViewCV object and that will be called by its gesture detector when a gesture is detected.
    ColorsCV
    Created by vogt on 12.01.2018.
    DependentBorderCV
    This class is used to specify borders that shall be drawn around object of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV.
    DependentGuiObjectCV
    This class is used to specify objects that can be displayed on the screen such that their visual display depends on other objects that are of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV.
    DependentLineObjectToObjectCV
    This class is used to specify lines that shall be drawn between two objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV.
    DependentLineObjectToPointCV
    This class is used to specify lines that shall be drawn between two objects of class AnimatedGuiObjectCV.
    DrawableTextCV
    This class can be used to generate Drawable objects that show texts.
    DrawableTextWithIconCV
    This class can be used to generate Drawable objects that show texts on their left and icons on their right, surrounded by a rectangle with rounded corners.
    GraphicsUtilsCV
    This class provides some utility methods for graphics programming.
    GraphsUtilsCV
    This class provides some utility methods for working with graphs, especially for displaying them on a screen.
    GUIUtilitiesCV
    Android utility class with basic GUI functions.
    RotatableDrawableCV
    Class for Drawable objects that can be rotated
